actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to require the preparation of written estimates for work to be performed on aircraft.

summary.text: Requires that, prior to the performance of any maintenance, alteration, overhaul, or repair work or an aircraft for which a customer is to be charged more than $100, the customer shall, unless otherwise agreed to in writing, be provided with a signed, written estimate for the work. Allows a customer charged in excess of ten percent of the written estimate to bring a course of action in a United States district court.

titles.title: A bill to require the preparation of written estimates for work to be performed on aircraft.
